LanguageData.ContentFinderOptimizer.EnableDesc: Enable/Disable the mod by skipping the code in the Harmony patches. Restart is NOT required. (Note: This does not fully disable the Harmony patches, disable the mod to do that.)
LanguageData.ContentFinderOptimizer.Label: Tick Lifetime (60 Ticks = 1 Second)
LanguageData.ContentFinderOptimizer.SubLabel: The number of ticks before a texture is removed from the cache. Restart is NOT required!
